alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:05PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Meagher and southern Judith Basin Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 604 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles east of White Sulphur Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Martinsdale and Checkerboard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
